title: [Yllira Sutara, Showroom]
description: Walls of warm wool felt patterned in rich jewel tones of burgundy, emerald, and sapphire blue hang from a silvery beech frame.  Ornate crystal globes hang from the ceiling, each etched with a detailed pattern of roses.  A thick velvet curtain is flanked by a slender polished oak stand and an etched glass case.
